Reviews.Title: Dell computers,,,
Reviews.Author: Terry Thomas
Reviews.Content: Bought my Dell and paid for in home repair...When I tried to use it I was told it was not being honored by Dell. Three months after I bought it it started going bad, Dell refused to fix it because they wouldn't honor any of their Warranties, and they refused to sell the parts I needed,  to have it fixed to my local computer repair...Six months after I bought it I had a $3,000 + paper weight..Don't buy a Dell or Alien ware they are so bad they won't even honor their own warranties. I spent two years trying to get them to fix or replace it and they didn't even have the dignity to ever write back. Not worth the trouble!!!!!
